attributes.action: Instruct those in his office responsible for replying to petitions to give a proper answer rather than political spin.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The answers to petitions published by the Prime Minister's Office do not give a straight answer to the petition.
We request that the Prime Minister should instruct those answering petitions to give a proper answer, not a load of political spin and mutual back-slapping.

rejection.details: Any comments on the e-petitioning system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
